synopsis.text: Robot warriors unite to combat a colossal sea creature, the Dragonsaurus, which has emerged from the depths of the ocean, wreaking havoc on oil tankers and swallowing up allies. Great Mazinger, Grendizer, and the Getter Robo G team form a Super Robot Army to thwart the prehistoric beast's path of destruction towards Tokyo. With the fate of their comrade, Boss Borot, hanging in the balance, the combined might of these mechanical heroes may be the only hope for Japan's salvation. Will they triumph over the monstrous Dragonsaurus and rescue Boss Borot before it's too late?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
